body:
Comment 5 by **evan.christopher.davis**: 
evan@evan-desktop:~/go/src/lib9$ /bin/pwd
/home/evan/go/src/lib9
evan@evan-desktop:~/go/src/lib9$ /bin/pwd -P
/bin/pwd: invalid option -- 'P'
Try `/bin/pwd --help' for more information.
evan@evan-desktop:~/go/src/lib9$ 

Only options appear to be --help and --version.
